product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy Mega 2, Brown Black 16GB (AT&T)
product_meta.description: Enjoy everything you love on a screen that displays it all brilliantly. With 6.0" of space and a beautiful 720p high-definition screen, the Galaxy Mega 2 makes pictures bright, text clear and easy to read, and movies feel larger than life. A cross between a smartphone and a tablet, the Galaxy Mega 2 is perfect for any and all multimedia. With the Galaxy Mega 2, youll be equipped with a professional-quality camera and 1080p video recording capabilities that let you capture the big picture. (Sim Card Not Included)
